name: Matrix
description: Matrix produces a virtual office for remote teams. In this project, you can run a virtual office to simulate the physical environment

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Google Client Id to the OAuth authentication

GOOGLE_SECRET.description: Google Secret to the OAuth authentication

GOOGLE_CALLBACK_URL.description: The callback Url to the OAuth authentication

WHITELIST_DOMAINS.description: The list of valid email domains to enter in matrix

ENFORCE_SSL.description: If you running in HTTPS this variable forces redirect to HTTPS when user access with HTTP
